downloadTitle: Distributed Agile Development at Microsoft patterns and practices
downloadDescription: This paper describes some of the proven practices about distributed agile development learned by teams within Microsoft’s patterns & practices group.
detailsSection: This paper describes some of the proven practices about distributed agile development and the specific lessons learned by teams within Microsoft’s patterns & practices group over numerous agile projects using distributed teams.
installInstructionSection: Click the Download button, then follow the dialog box instruction to open or save the file to a location you specify on your system.
